message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.RO

This paper describes a modular continual reinforcement learning paradigm in a visual interaction environment. The paper focuses on the design of neural network motifs and a meta-controller architecture for task switching. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.CV (Computer Vision). Additionally, the paper also discusses the properties of module architecture, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) and cs.RO (Robotics).
